From: Motor Dubai <motor@nascodubai.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>; Sandro Sawaya <Sandro.Sawaya@chalhoub.com>
CC: Diana Haydar <Diana.Haydar@nascodubai.com>; Direct Sales Dubai <DirectSales@nascodubai.com>

Date: 2025-03-04 14:14
Subject: Motor Renewal Quotation || Policy - 82-MVA-2024-00992 || Insured Name - ISKANDER SAWAYA BASILI
--------------------------------------------------
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

Dear ISKANDER SAWAYA BASILI, 

We are pleased to attach herewith the motor renewal quote for your vehicle.

In order to proceed, please advise & provide the following. 



*	Emirates Id copy
*	Driving License copy
*	Start date required - date that the registration would be done - the policy will start from this date for 13 months as required by RTA
*	Existing Registration Card Copy
*	Online payment link will be sent across on confirmation of the above


We are pleased to announce that our car rental benefit has undergone significant enhancements to better serve the needs of our customers.

chunks.text:
*	Emirates Id copy
*	Driving License copy
*	Start date required - date that the registration would be done - the policy will start from this date for 13 months as required by RTA
*	Existing Registration Card Copy
*	Online payment link will be sent across on confirmation of the above


We are pleased to announce that our car rental benefit has undergone significant enhancements to better serve the needs of our customers.

These improvements include an expanded selection of vehicles, allowing you to choose the option that best aligns with your preferences and requirements.

Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.


S.No	 Type Of Car	 7 Days	 10 Days	 15 Days	 20 Days	 
1	 1.5 / 1.6 Ltr	 Complimentary  	 AED 165  	 AED 235  	 AED 315  	 
2	 2.0 / 2.4 Ltr	 AED 175  	 AED 245  	 AED 345  	 AED 475  	 
3	 BMW 5 series or similar  	 AED 1,125  	 AED 1,565  	 AED 2,350  	 AED 3,125  	 

We remain at your disposal for any clarifications you may need.

With assurance of our best services at all times.



Regards,

Motor Underwriting Department

Nasco Gulf


P.O. Box 26590, Dubai, UAE
T +971 4 351 8610  F +971 4 351 8710
E motor@nascodubai.com
www.nascogulf.com <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/CCS2CrMz4TDgvl4Czh7U4HslS?domain=nascogulf.com/>

Dear ISKANDER SAWAYA BASILI,

*	Emirates Id copy
*	Driving License copy
*	Start date required - date that the registration would be done - the policy will start from this date for 13 months as required by RTA
